name: Benjamin Blümchen: Törööö im Zoo
overview: Benjamin Blümchen: Törööö im Zoo is a minigame collection. The player spends some time in the Neustädter Zoo with Benjamin the elephant and his friend Otto. The player guides the two friends to the zoo exhibits to play minigames. For each mastered difficulty level of a minigame he receives a reward. The player has 60 animal stickers to unlock in a scrapbook by completing minigames (one reward per difficulty).
